body: Reply to myself! Annual solar radiation calculates total radiation in kWh to m2 during a year. What is for Graz 1130 kWh/m2. That is why I get red color on some places. It is max. radiation in a year.  When I change legend segment to more, 24 for example,then I menage change legend colors but now I always get just blue parts of gradient. Because now during a 3 month period every part of geometry gets no more than 400 kWh/m2.  Conclusion : Wrong Question!!!
